autoFixFontSize.description: Whether the font size is automatically adjusted based on the avatar size, (which takes precedence over the Avatar component itself)
autoFixFontSize.description_zh: 是否自动根据头像尺寸调整字体大小，(优先级低于 Avatar 组件本身)

zIndexAscend.description: The z-index of the avatars in the avatar group is incrementing, and the default is decreasing.
zIndexAscend.description_zh: 头像组内的头像 z-index 递增，默认是递减。

:maxCount.description: The maximum number of avatars displayed in the avatar group, and the extra avatars will be displayed in the form of +x.
:maxCount.description_zh: 头像组最多显示的头像数量，多余头像将以 +x 的形式展示。

:size.description: The size of the avatar, in px, (priority is lower than the avatar component itself)
:size.description_zh: 头像的尺寸大小，单位是 px，(优先级低于 Avatar 组件本身)

shape.description: The shape of the avatar, (which takes precedence over the Avatar component itself)
shape.description_zh: 头像的形状，(优先级低于 Avatar 组件本身)
